named-query.name: query1.findAllByUniqueId
named-query.query: select k from AddressEntity k where k.userEntity.uniqueId= :val1

named-query.name: query2.findAllByUniqueId
named-query.query: select k from MeetingEntity k where k.userEntity.uniqueId= :val1

named-query.name: query3.findAllByUserId
named-query.query: select k from MeetingEntity k where k.userEntity.userId= :val1 and k.isActive= 'true'

named-query.name: query5.findAllByUniqueId
named-query.query: select k from UserEntity k where k.uniqueId= :val1

named-query.name: query6.findAllByUserId
named-query.query: select k from AddressEntity k where k.userEntity.userId=:val2

named-query.name: query4.findAllByEmailId
named-query.query: select k from UserEntity k where (k.email=?1 OR k.mobile=?1) and k.active = 'true'

named-query.name: query9.getAddressDetailsById
named-query.query: select k from AddressEntity k where k.addressId= :val1

named-query.name: query11.getPincodeById
named-query.query: select k from PinCodeEntity k where k.pinCodeId = :val1

named-query.name: query8.getMeetingDetailsById
named-query.query: select k from MeetingEntity k where k.dateId= :val1
